nodes.name: ERC20Basic

@dev Basic version of StandardToken, with no allowances.

transfer
balanceOf
StandardToken
transferFrom
approve
allowance
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership
MintableToken
mint

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to stop minting new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: stopMinting

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to start minting new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
nodes.name: startMinting

nodes.documentation: HDL (Handelion) Token
nodes.name: HDLToken

nodes.documentation: Transfers token ownership from Pre-sale to Sale
nodes.name: TransferTokenOwnership

nodes.documentation:
Finishes PRE-ICO crowdsale and closes current contract.
Checks is goal is reached. If it is reached then withdraws all funds to vault address
Otherwise tries to refund investors or Opens contract for refunding.
nodes.name: finish

nodes.documentation:
Refunds investor. Should be called by investors.
If contract state is in Refunding state then returns to investor sent amount.
nodes.name: requestRefunding

nodes.documentation: Accepts ethers from investor and sends back HDL tokens.
nodes.name: buyTokens

allowance(address,address).details: Function to check the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

params._owner: address The address which owns the funds.
params._spender: address The address which will spend the funds.

allowance(address,address).return: A uint256 specifing the amount of tokens still available for the spender.

approve(address,uint256).details: Aprove the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of msg.sender.

params._spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params._value: The amount of tokens to be spent.

balanceOf(address).details: Gets the balance of the specified address.

params._owner: The address to query the the balance of.

balanceOf(address).return: An uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to mint.
params._to: The address that will recieve the minted tokens.

mint(address,uint256).return: A boolean that indicates if the operation was successful.

startMinting().details: Function to start minting new tokens.
startMinting().return: True if the operation was successful.

stopMinting().details: Function to stop minting new tokens.
stopMinting().return: True if the operation was successful.

transfer(address,uint256).details: transfer token for a specified address

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer tokens from one address to another

params._from: address The address which you want to send tokens from
params._to: address The address which you want to transfer to
params._value: uint256 the amout of tokens to be transfered

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.
